correctness.rationale: Major factual and schema issues are present. Key problems: (1) Missing process: the article reports ZnO ALD on both GaN/c-sapphire and YSZ; only the GaN process is extracted. (2) Growth-per-cycle unit error: set to 0.25 Å, but the article states ~0.25 nm/cycle (~2.5 Å) on GaN. (3) Dosing and purge times are wrong by orders of magnitude: article gives 0.5–5 s pulses and 1–5 s purges; extraction uses 0.5 ms and 1.0 ms with the milliseconds unit. (4) Flow rates: precursor/co-reactant flows are set to 0.0 (not reported in the article), while only N2 purge 500 sccm is given; zeros are not traceable and incorrect. (5) Numerous nulls and placeholder values violate schema and traceability: plasmaPower=None, supercycleDesign=None, optical refractiveIndex=None, absorptionCoefficient=None, electricalProperties=None, many deviceProperties=None, filmStability=None, reproducibility=None. The schema expects objects or omission, not nulls. (6) Unsupported/ungrounded values: nucleationPeriod=0 cycles (not reported), uniformity variation=0%, conformality aspectRatio=0, elementalConcentration=0%, atomicRatio=1:1, filmDensity=0—all not provided by the article. (7) Band gap: 3.24 eV is taken from PL emission (UV peak), not a measured optical band gap via appropriate method; labeling it as bandGap with PL is questionable. (8) Carrier gas: set to N2, but only purging N2 is explicitly reported; carrier gas for delivery is not stated—traceability is weak. Minor: pressure entered as a single value (6 mmHg) though article gives 6–8 Torr. Correct items include reactor (F-120, Microchemistry), material (ZnO), precursors (DEZn/H2O), substrate (GaN/c-sapphire), temperature (300 °C), number of cycles (700), film thickness (~170 nm), roughness on GaN (~4.6 nm), and epitaxial crystallinity. Overall, the extraction contains multiple incorrect values, schema violations (nulls), placeholders, and missing the second process.

completeness.rationale: Major incompleteness and schema issues. (1) Missing process: The article reports ZnO ALD on both GaN/c-sapphire and YSZ(111); only the GaN process is extracted. A separate YSZ process with the same reactor/chemistry, T=300 C, pressure 6–8 Torr, purge N2=500 sccm, film thickness ≈45 nm and GPC ≈0.07 nm/cycle should be added. (2) Growth-per-cycle wrong unit/value: Reported GPC on GaN is ~0.25 nm/cycle (~2.5 Å/cycle), but extraction uses 0.25 Å/cycle, which is 10× too small and inconsistent with 170 nm at 700 cycles. Correct to 2.5 Å/cycle. (3) Dosing/purge times incorrect: Article gives 0.5–5 s precursor pulses and 1–5 s purges; extraction uses 0.5 ms and 1 ms (wrong units and likely values). Convert to milliseconds correctly (e.g., 500–5000 ms) or pick a traceable value; avoid fabricating. (4) Pressure: Article states 6–8 Torr; extraction fixes 6 Torr without noting range. (5) Flow rates: Precursor and co-reactant flows are set to 0.0 sccm with unit SCM-PER-MIN—these values are not reported and 0.0 is incorrect; only N2 purge 500 sccm is traceable. (6) Unsupported/fabricated properties: nucleationPeriod set to 0 cycles (not reported); uniformity variation 0% and conformality aspect ratio 0 (not reported); filmComposition with elemental concentration 0% and atomic ratio 1:1 (not reported); filmDensity 0.0 (not reported). These should be omitted or justified; do not invent values. (7) Schema violations: multiple fields set to null (plasmaPower, supercycleDesign, electricalProperties, deviceProperties subfields, filmStability, reproducibility), which violates the schema’s non-null/object requirements. Replace with valid objects or omit optional fields. Overall, many required or included fields are incorrect, untraceable, or null, and one of the two processes is entirely missing.
